price: E, nesse caso, haver-lhes-ía-mos concedido, de Nossa parte, magnífico prêmio.
arabic: وَإِذٗا لَّأٓتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّن لَّدُنَّآ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhan laātaynāhum min ladunnā ajran ʿaẓīman
